zone.line: a tremendous peal of thunder descended on
it; and when my eyes recovered its their
sight after the dazzling light, the oak
no longer stood in the field meadow – The
old man uttered a wild exclamation of
horror when he saw so sudden an inter
-pretation given to my prophesy. I start-
-ed up, my strength my terror returned;
I cried, "Oh, God! Is this thy decree? Yet
perhaps I shall not be too late."
Although still several miles dis
tant we continued a to approach the
sea. At an inn We came at last
to the road that led to town of —
and at an inn there we heard that
my father had passed by somewhat
before sunset; he had observed the ap-
proaching storm and had hired a
horse from ^for the next town which was
situated a mile from the sea that
he might arrive there before it should
with my ^terror;
